required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Simplified Detection of Dynamic Hyperinflation Using Metronome Paced Hyperventilation and the Effect of Tiotropium in Patients With COPD

brief_summary.textblock: We will detect dynamic hyperinflation (DH) in 40 COPD (chronic obstructive pulmonary disease) patients with moderately severe disease using metronome paced hyperventilation (MPH) with inspiratory capacity as the primary end point. Hypothesis: Is tiotropium capable of lung volume protecting inspiratory capacity from MPH induced DH vs placebo in a randomized crossover double blinded study.

detailed_description.textblock: Study completed with 29 patients studied. Data is being analyzed to evaluate trough and peak effect of 18 µg tiotropium vs placebo on FEV 1 (L)(forced expiratory capacity in one second), inspiratory capacity and functional residual volume. In addition, we will study the effect of 18 µg tiotropium vs placebo on metronome paced hyperventilation induced dynamic hyperinflation. We will also evaluate the effect of tiotropium induced increase in IC (inspiratory capacity) vs extent of emphysema as evaluated on high resolution thin section CT lung

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Bronchodilator Response:Peak FEV1(L)(Forced Expiratory Volume in One Second)-
primary_outcome.description: Lung function studies (mean +/- SD): peak FEV1 (+2h) after 30 days of placebo or tiotropium in 29 moderate COPD patients. FEV1 = Forced expiratory volume in one second
Lung function studies (mean +/- SD): peak FRC after 30 days (+2h) of placebo or tiotropium in 29 moderate COPD patients.

primary_outcome.measure: Bronchodilator Response: Peak FVC (L) (Forced Vital Capacity)- Tiotropium and Placebo
primary_outcome.description: Lung function studies (mean +/- SD) of peak forced vital capaciy (L) after 30 days (+2h) of tiotropium versus placebo in 29 moderate COPD patients. Forced vital capacity - liters

primary_outcome.measure: Bronchodilator Response: Peak IC (L) - (Inspiratory Capacity) - Tiotropium Versus Placebo
primary_outcome.description: Lung function studies (mean +/- SD) - Peak inspiratory capacity after 30 days (+2h)of tiotropium versus placebo in 29 moderate COPD patients. Inspiratory capacity- liters

primary_outcome.measure: Bronchodilator Response: Peak FRC/TLC Percentage (Functional Residual Capacity(L)/Total Lung Capacity(L) - Tiotropium or Placebo
primary_outcome.description: Lung function studies (mean +/- SD) peak Peak FRC/TLC after 30 days (+2h)of tiotropium versus placebo in 29 moderate COPD patients. Functional residual capacity/total lung capacity - percentage

primary_outcome.measure: Bronchodilator Response: Peak TLC (L) (Total Lung Capacity)- Tiotropium or Placebo
primary_outcome.description: Net change in lung function studies (mean +/- SE) from baseline to trough (-1h) and peak (+2h) after 30 days of tiotropium versus placebo in 29 moderate COPD patients. Total lung capacity - liters

primary_outcome.measure: Bronchodilator Response: Trough FEV1 (L)- (Forced Expiratory Volume) Tiotropium Versus Placebo
primary_outcome.description: Lung function studies Trough FEV1(mean +/- SD) after 30 days(-1h) of tiotropium versus placebo in 29 moderate COPD patients. Forced expiratory volume in 1s (liters)

primary_outcome.measure: Bronchodilator Response: Trough FRC (L)- Tiotropium Versus Placebo
primary_outcome.description: Lung function studies Trough FRC(mean +/- SD) after 30 days(-1h) of tiotropium versus placebo in 29 moderate COPD patients. Functional residual capacity(liters)

primary_outcome.measure: Bronchodilator Response: Trough FVC (L)- (Forced Vital Capacity) Tiotropium Versus Placebo
primary_outcome.description: Lung function studies Trough FVC(mean +/- SD) after 30 days(-1h) of tiotropium versus placebo in 29 moderate COPD patients

primary_outcome.measure: Bronchodilator Response: Trough IC (L) Inspiratory Capacity - Tiotropium Versus Placebo
primary_outcome.description: Lung function studies (Trough IC(mean +/- SD) after 30 days(-1h) of tiotropium versus placebo in 29 moderate COPD patients Trough inspiratory capacity- liters

primary_outcome.measure: Bronchodilator Response: Trough FRC/TLC (Functional Residual Capacity/Total Lung Capacity)- Tiotropium Versus Placebo
primary_outcome.description: Lung function studies Trough FRC/TLC(mean +/- SD) after 30 days(-1h) of tiotropium versus placebo in 29 moderate COPD patients Trough Functional residual capacity/total lung capacity - percentage

primary_outcome.measure: Bronchodilator Response: Trough TLC (L) (Total Lung Capacity)- Tiotropium Versus Placebo
primary_outcome.description: Lung function studies Trough TLC(mean +/- SD) after 30 days(-1h) of tiotropium versus placebo in 29 moderate COPD patients

primary_outcome.measure: IC (Inspiratory Capacity L)and Metronome Paced Hyperventilation-induced Dynamic Hyperinflation in Tiotropium Cohort Versus Placebo and Baseline
primary_outcome.description: IC measurement before and after metronome paced hyperventilation-induced dynamic hyperinflation at baseline and in tiotropium and placebo groups. Measure ratio of functional residual capacity divided by total lung capacity at baseline and after 30 days of tiotropium versus placebo

primary_outcome.measure: TLC (L) Before and After Metronome Paced Hyperventilation Induced Dynamic Hyperinflation in Tiotropium Cohort Versus Placebo
primary_outcome.time_frame: one hour before intervention & 2 hrs. after after 30 days
primary_outcome.description: Total lung capacity before and after metronome paced hyperventilation induced dynamic hyperinflation in tiotropium cohort versus placebo. Difference between TLC measured at one hour before intervention & 2 hrs. after after 30 days of treatment with either placebo or tiotropium

secondary_outcome.measure: Extent of Lung CT Scored Emphysema and and Lung Function of FEV1(l) After Tiotropium
secondary_outcome.description: Correlation between improved lung function after tiotropium and extent of lung CT scored emphysema with respect to FEV 1; correlation of tiotropium induced bronchodilation and extent of lung ct scored emphysema; measures include increase in FEV1 from baseline to peak tiotropium

secondary_outcome.measure: IC (Inspiratory Capacity, L) Post Mph (Metronome Paced Hyperventilation) Induced dh (Dynamic Hyperinflation) After Tiotropium and Extent of Lung CT Scored Emphysema
secondary_outcome.description: Correlation between change in inspiratory capacity (L) post metronome paced hyperventilation induced dynamic hyperinflation and extent of lung ct scored emphysema

secondary_outcome.measure: Extent of Lung CT Scored Emphysema and and Lung Function of FRC/TLC (Functional Residual Capacity(L)/Total Lung Capacity (L) After Tiotropium
secondary_outcome.description: Correlation between improved lung function after tiotropium and extent of lung CT scored emphysema with respect to ratio functional residual capacity divided by total lung capacity. Specifically, correlation of tiotropium induced bronchodilation and extent of lung ct scored emphysema

arm_group.description: tiotropium 18 µg capsule for 1 month versus placebo. To study bronchodilation and effect following metronome paced hyperventilation and induced dynamic hyperinflation of active tiotropium versus placebo

intervention.description: Procedure/Surgery - tiotropium 18ug capsule daily for 1 month vs placebo to study the effect of trough and peak effect on bronchodilation and effect of metronome paced hyperventilation induced dynamic hyperinflation
18ug tiotropium placebo capsule daily for 1 month
daily tiotropium 18ug versus daily placebo for 30 days

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Moderately severe COPD patients age 40-85 yr with post 180ug albuterol FEV 1 between 60 and 79% predicted and FEV 1/FVC < 70%.
- Smoking history > 10 pack yr.
- Clinically stable X 6 weeks.
- No oxygen usage.
Exclusion Criteria:
- History of asthma
- Clinically unstable
- Any other significant medical problem precluding full cooperation for study

overall_official.affiliation: Mt. Sinai Hosp. Toronto, Univ Toronto Medical Center

reference.citation: Gelb AF, Gutierrez CA, Weisman IM, Newsom R, Taylor CF, Zamel N. Simplified detection of dynamic hyperinflation. Chest. 2004 Dec;126(6):1855-60.

Gelb AF, Taylor CF, McClean PA, Shinar CM, Rodrigues MT, Gutierrez CA, Chapman KR, Zamel N. Tiotropium and simplified detection of dynamic hyperinflation. Chest. 2007 Mar;131(3):690-695. doi: 10.1378/chest.06-1662.

participant_flow.recruitment_details: Patients with COPD (chronic obstructive pulmonary disease), GOLD (Global Initiative for Chronic Obstructive Lung Disease)Stage 2 were recruited from pulmonary out-patient offices at Mt. Sinai Hosp. Toronto and from Arthur F Gelb MD Lakewood, Calif from June 2009 thru January 2010
participant_flow.pre_assignment_details: We recruited 30 patients with smoking history >20 pack yr with documented GOLD Stage 2 moderate COPD who were clinically stable for at least 6 weeks prior to the present study and were not on oxygen or oral corticosteroids.

group.title: Tiotropium 18 µg Capsule First, Then Placebo
group.description: tiotropium 18 µg capsule for 1 month versus placebo. To study bronchodilation and effect following metronome paced hyperventilation and induced dynamic hyperinflation of active tiotropium versus placebo

group.title: Placebo First, Then Tiotropium Bromide 18 µg
group.description: tiotropium 18 µg capsule for 1 month versus placebo. To study bronchodilation and effect following metronome paced hyperventilation and induced dynamic hyperinflation of active tiotropium versus placebo

group.title: Entire Study Population
group.description: Includes groups randomized to receive placebo first and Tiotropium first.

analysis.groups_desc: Mean difference of Peak FEV1 of tiotropium minus placebo. 29 patients needed to achieve a power of 80% at a significant alpha level of 5% using projected sample inspiratory capacity of 2.23+/- 0.5L post tiotropium compared to baseline inspiratory capacity 2.0+/-0.5L
analysis.p_value_desc: a priori threshold for statistical significance: p<0.05

outcome.population: High-resolution, thin-section scans of the lung were obtained from a subset of 19 patients.

analysis.groups_desc: Mean difference of Trough FRC/TLC of tiotropium minus placebo. 29 patients needed to achieve a power of 80% at a significant alpha level of 5% using projected sample inspiratory capacity of 2.23+/- 0.5L post tiotropium compared to baseline inspiratory capacity 2.0+/-0.5L
analysis.p_value_desc: A priori threshold for statistical significance: p<0.05

outcome.title: Bronchodilator Response: Trough TLC (L) (Total Lung Capacity)- Tiotropium Versus Placebo
outcome.description: Lung function studies Trough TLC(mean +/- SD) after 30 days(-1h) of tiotropium versus placebo in 29 moderate COPD patients
outcome.population: Lung function studies Trough TLC(mean +/- SD) after 30 days(-1h) of tiotropium versus placebo in 29 moderate COPD patients

group.title: Placebo
group.description: Includes groups randomized to receive placebo first and Tiotropium first.

group.title: Tiotropium
group.description: Includes groups randomized to receive placebo first and Tiotropium first.

measure.title: Bronchodilator Response: Trough TLC (L) (Total Lung Capacity)- Tiotropium Versus Placebo
measure.description: Lung function studies Trough TLC(mean +/- SD) after 30 days(-1h) of tiotropium versus placebo in 29 moderate COPD patients
measure.population: Lung function studies Trough TLC(mean +/- SD) after 30 days(-1h) of tiotropium versus placebo in 29 moderate COPD patients

analysis.groups_desc: Mean difference of Trough TLC (L) of tiotropium minus placebo. 29 patients needed to achieve a power of 80% at a significant alpha level of 5% using projected sample inspiratory capacity of 2.23+/- 0.5L post tiotropium compared to baseline inspiratory capacity 2.0+/-0.5L
analysis.p_value_desc: A priori threshold for statistical significance: p<0.05

outcome.title: IC (Inspiratory Capacity L)and Metronome Paced Hyperventilation-induced Dynamic Hyperinflation in Tiotropium Cohort Versus Placebo and Baseline
outcome.description: IC measurement before and after metronome paced hyperventilation-induced dynamic hyperinflation at baseline and in tiotropium and placebo groups. Measure ratio of functional residual capacity divided by total lung capacity at baseline and after 30 days of tiotropium versus placebo
outcome.population: Inspiratory capacity (IC) (mean +/- SD) from baseline and after 30 days of tiotropium versus placebo in 29 moderate COPD patients.

group.title: Before DH (Dynamic Hyperinflation)
group.description: IC (inspiratory capacity) before and after metronome paced hyperventilation and induced dynamic hyperinflation at baseline;

group.title: After DH (Dynamic Hyperinflation
group.description: IC (inspiratory capacity) before and after metronome paced hyperventilation induced dynamic hyperinflation post 30 days plus 2h placebo

measure.title: IC (Inspiratory Capacity L)and Metronome Paced Hyperventilation-induced Dynamic Hyperinflation in Tiotropium Cohort Versus Placebo and Baseline
measure.description: IC measurement before and after metronome paced hyperventilation-induced dynamic hyperinflation at baseline and in tiotropium and placebo groups. Measure ratio of functional residual capacity divided by total lung capacity at baseline and after 30 days of tiotropium versus placebo
measure.population: Inspiratory capacity (IC) (mean +/- SD) from baseline and after 30 days of tiotropium versus placebo in 29 moderate COPD patients.

analysis.groups_desc: Change in IC before and after dynamic hyperinflation. 29 patients needed to achieve a power of 80% at a significant alpha level of 5% using projected sample inspiratory capacity of 2.23+/- 0.5L post tiotropium compared to baseline inspiratory capacity 2.0+/-0.5L
analysis.p_value_desc: A priori threshold for statistical significance: p<0.05

outcome.title: TLC (L) Before and After Metronome Paced Hyperventilation Induced Dynamic Hyperinflation in Tiotropium Cohort Versus Placebo
outcome.description: Total lung capacity before and after metronome paced hyperventilation induced dynamic hyperinflation in tiotropium cohort versus placebo. Difference between TLC measured at one hour before intervention & 2 hrs. after after 30 days of treatment with either placebo or tiotropium
outcome.time_frame: one hour before intervention & 2 hrs. after after 30 days
outcome.population: lung function studies (mean +/- SE) from baseline to trough (-1h) and peak (+2h) after 30 days of tiotropium versus placebo in 29 moderate COPD patients.

group.title: 2h Post Placebo TLC(L)
group.description: total lung capacity (L) following metronome paced hyperventilation induced dynamic hyperinflation post 30 days plus 2h placebo

group.title: TLC (L) 2h Post Tiotropium
group.description: Total Lung Capacity (L)following metronome paced hyperventilation induced dynamic hyperinflation post 30 days plus 2h tiotropium

measure.title: TLC (L) Before and After Metronome Paced Hyperventilation Induced Dynamic Hyperinflation in Tiotropium Cohort Versus Placebo
measure.description: Total lung capacity before and after metronome paced hyperventilation induced dynamic hyperinflation in tiotropium cohort versus placebo. Difference between TLC measured at one hour before intervention & 2 hrs. after after 30 days of treatment with either placebo or tiotropium
measure.population: lung function studies (mean +/- SE) from baseline to trough (-1h) and peak (+2h) after 30 days of tiotropium versus placebo in 29 moderate COPD patients.

analysis.groups_desc: 29 patients needed to achieve a power of 80% at a significant alpha level of 5% using projected sample inspiratory capacity of 2.23+/- 0.5L post tiotropium compared to baseline inspiratory capacity 2.0+/-0.5L
analysis.p_value_desc: Total lung capacity was similar in all groups and was not significant

outcome.title: Extent of Lung CT Scored Emphysema and and Lung Function of FRC/TLC (Functional Residual Capacity(L)/Total Lung Capacity (L) After Tiotropium
outcome.description: Correlation between improved lung function after tiotropium and extent of lung CT scored emphysema with respect to ratio functional residual capacity divided by total lung capacity. Specifically, correlation of tiotropium induced bronchodilation and extent of lung ct scored emphysema
outcome.population: High resolution, thin-section scans of the lung were obtained in a subset of 19 patients.

group.title: Lung CT Scored Emphysema and FRC/TLC
group.description: Extent of lung CT scored emphysema (percent of lung) and lung function of FRC/TLC (functional residual capacity(L)/total lung capacity (L) after tiotropium

measure.title: Extent of Lung CT Scored Emphysema and and Lung Function of FRC/TLC (Functional Residual Capacity(L)/Total Lung Capacity (L) After Tiotropium
measure.description: Correlation between improved lung function after tiotropium and extent of lung CT scored emphysema with respect to ratio functional residual capacity divided by total lung capacity. Specifically, correlation of tiotropium induced bronchodilation and extent of lung ct scored emphysema
measure.population: High resolution, thin-section scans of the lung were obtained in a subset of 19 patients.

analysis.groups_desc: Correlation between improved lung function after tiotropium and extent of lung CT scored emphysema with respect to ratio functional residual capacity divided by total lung capacity. Specifically, correlation of tiotropium induced bronchodilation and extent of lung ct scored emphysema
analysis.p_value_desc: A priori threshold for statistical significance: p= 0.05

group.title: Tiotropium Bromide 18 µg, Capsule,
group.description: tiotropium 18 µg capsule for 1 month. To study bronchodilation and effect following metronome paced hyperventilation and induced dynamic hyperinflation of active tiotropium. (30 enrolled subjects, one drop-out)

group.title: Placebo
group.description: Adverse events after placebo. (30 enrolled subjects, one drop-out)

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: There is NOT an agreement between Principal Investigators and the Sponsor (or its agents) that restricts the PI's rights to discuss or publish trial results after the trial is completed.
